name: REFLEXION (IcebergLettuce)
description:
REFLEXION is a puzzle game where you are the mirror! When you press space, everything on your right gets mirrored to the left! Use your brain to put your mirrors in the right places and get to the glass shards! 

WASD = Move

SPACE = Mirror

P = Fullscreen

R = Restart

Also, there's a creative mode where you can design your own puzzles! Fun stuff, I know. Thanks for checking out my submission!

-IcebergLettuce
